item.title: Write Racket With Emacs
item.description: At the opening of my previous blog Using Emacs Editor For The First Time says I want to use Emacs to program in Racket language. Now it’s the time to share my Emacs configuration and some humble opinions. racket-mode In Emacs, almost every programming language has its own major mode. And the Racket language has no exception. racket-mode is the only and powerful Emacs major mode package. (use-package racket-mode :straight t :hook (racket-mode .
